$documentation.purpose: Runtime context for the active discovery session. Tracks session metadata, analyzed materials, and cumulative findings during discovery execution.
$documentation.phase_position: Created at CP0, updated throughout discovery phases

key_attributes.session_id: Unique identifier for this discovery session
key_attributes.system_name: Name of the system being analyzed
key_attributes.materials_analyzed: List of files that have been processed
key_attributes.key_findings: Summary of major discoveries during analysis
key_attributes.pain_points_count: Running count of pain points extracted

validation_rules: session_id MUST be unique per discovery run
started_at MUST be a valid ISO timestamp
